title: Tomb Raider Collection 1 - 5 (PC)
description:
Original Tomb Raider CD-ROMS in format CUE BIN (with sound tracks) or ISO.

This torrent contains:

Tomb Raider 1 Atlantean Scion
Tomb Raider 1 expansion Unfinished Business
Tomb Raider 2 The Dagger of Xian
Tomb Raider 2 expansion The Golden Mask
Tomb Raider 3 Lara Croft Adventures
Tomb Raider 3 expansion The Last Artifact
Tomb Raider 4 The Last Revelation
Tomb Raider 5 Chronicles


instructions: Mount the image with a virtual cdrom drive, install, apply patch and run.


Important!!!

In order to run this games in modern systems (WinXP, Vista or Windows 7) please see information concerning patches and fixes in: http://www.tombraiderchronicles.com/
